trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração que especifica o âmbito do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>como uma página, documento ou sequência de documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by `printTicketLevel`, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: Com base no âmbito da definido pelo `printTicketLevel`, o número de páginas ou o número de documentos associado <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a predefinição definições de impressora a utilizar quando o documento está a ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentPrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: A definição da propriedade CurrentPrintTicket não valida ou modificar a especificado <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, utilize o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-específico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é válido para uma impressora indicada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: As definições de impressora predefinida a utilizar quando o documento está a ser impresso.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o âmbito do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When the CurrentPrintTicketLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de CurrentPrintTicketLevel é <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>propriedade especifica o número de saída de documentos com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>

trans-unit.source: For other CurrentPrintTicketLevel values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para outros valores CurrentPrintTicketLevel, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>propriedade especifica o número de saída de páginas com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração que indica o âmbito do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> </xref> eventos para uma sequência de documentos, um único documento ou uma única página.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de documentos ou páginas de saída com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the Sequence property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>propriedade é <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, a propriedade de sequência Especifica o número de saída de documentos com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the Sequence property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para outros <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>que valores, a propriedade de sequência Especifica o número de páginas de saída com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: O número de documentos ou páginas de saída com <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>
